member.name: M:Rg.Plugins.Popup.Animations.Base.BaseAnimation.HidePage(Xamarin.Forms.Page)
member.summary: Use this method for avoiding the problem with blinking animation on iOS See https://github.com/rotorgames/Rg.Plugins.Popup/issues/404
